Name: E-Shop:Dynamic Online Store Powered by MERN Stack
Desc: A fully-featured eCommerce platform. It includes user authentication with jwt and google, product management, payment with paypal, admin dashboard, real-time updates and many more for a seamless shopping experience

Name: Epic Escapes: The Ultimate Home Rental Experience Application
Desc: It is a platform for booking the perfect rental property. With a wide selection of homes for short-term stays or long-term leases, users can easily browse, filter, and secure their ideal space. Enjoy a stress-free booking experience with curated options tailored to every need

Name: InfoGenius: AI-Powered Knowledge Hub
Desc: It is an intelligent conversational platform powered by Gemini, offering instant, accurate answers and insightful discussions. Explore a seamless user experience that blends cutting-edge AI with expert-level information retrieval.

Name: AI Translator Powered by Gemini AI
Desc: It offers fast, accurate, and seamless translation across multiple languages using cutting-edge AI technology. Leverage the power of Gemini's advanced algorithms for smooth, real-time communication in any language.

Name: Coin Pulse: Track, Analyze, and Monitor Crypto Prices
Desc: It offers real-time cryptocurrency price tracking. Easily analyze and monitor market trends to stay informed and make smarter investment decisions. it helps you track price fluctuations and stay up-to-date on the latest crypto market movements.

Name: Generate Hilarious Memes on the Fly
Desc: Quickly create and customize memes with a user-friendly interface. Unleash your creativity and share laughter in seconds! Choose from a variety of templates to craft the perfect meme for any moment.

Name: Drive Away in Style with Buy Car
Desc: It offers a curated selection of top-quality vehicles to suit every lifestyle and budget. Our seamless buying experience ensures you find the perfect car with ease. Drive away in style today and make every journey unforgettable
